'''Darknight Blaze''' is [[Diluc]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
Diluc's hair is tied in a low ponytail.

Diluc wears a black dress shirt, a long white vest, a black ascot with a red gem, a black coat with fur trim at the bottom, black dress pants, a strap on his right thigh, cuffed black boots, and a pair of black gloves. His {{Pyro}} [[Vision]] is attached to a belt.

===Glowing Ornaments===
{{Glowing Ornament Info|outfit=Darknight Blaze|ornaments=the red gem on his tie and the red crosses on the four buttons on the back of his coat}}
